column5: Here is a picture of the first pike I have ever caught!  I have zero measurements/weight but its nothing to be ashamed of!   I look forward to catching some more of these come September when I hit up Parry Sound again!    Mini-report : I fished a local pond this morning...zero bites/zero fish! I was only out for about 2 hours and I was fishing from shore. I can't wait to get back up north and hopefully get my boat! I got my boaters card today, but I still wont have to register or license my boat!   I can barely contain myself!
Right on TC1OZ Good looking snake!!! Congrats on your first Leechman
Congrads on the first pike man! My first wasn't much bigger than that fish 22" long i think was lol.  Thanks for sharing, MTBF
